page.title: 08A DAY AT HUMBIE SCHOOL
page.content: THERE ARE TWELVE CHILDREN IN SCHOOL. SIX OF THEM COME TO SCHOOL IN THE SCHOOL BUS.WE HAVE ONE TEACHER,FIVE CHILDREN UNDER EIGHT AND SEVEN OVER EIGHT.THERE IS ONE BIG CLASSROOM WHICH WAS TWO WHEN THERE WERE MORE CHILDREN. AT TEN TO NINE WE COME IN.WE READ,THEN WE MIGHT DO MATHS OR WRITING.AT BREAK THE BOYS PLAY FOOTBALL OR WITW TOY CARS.THE GIRLS TALK OR PLAY A GAME.AFTER LUNCH WE DO DRAWING,MUSIC OR CRAFT,WORK ON THE COMPUTER OR CHOOSE A GAME.WE WORK OUT OF SCHOOL TOO.ON RECENT OUTINGS WE HAVE BEEN TO SEE TWO PLAYS,VISITED A BOOK FESTIVAL, AN ART GALLERY AND HAD A WALK ALONG AN OLD RAILWAY.TEACHERS OF FABRIC CRAFT AND GYM ALSO VISIT US WEEKLY.
